floor_plan.description: A minimalist two-story 4BHK bungalow design that respects local building norms and Vastu principles. The ground floor includes an open-plan kitchen and living area along with guest spaces and utility areas. A private gym is integrated into the upper level along with the bedrooms and service areas.

rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: Serves as a transitional space from outdoors to indoors, ensuring proper entry orientation according to Vastu.

rooms.name: Open-plan Kitchen & Living Area
rooms.description: Minimally designed living and cooking area that fosters an open atmosphere. The kitchen is integrated with the living area for efficient use of space.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest bedroom located near the main entrance; maintains a minimalist style.

rooms.name: Utility Area
rooms.description: Includes washroom facilities for guests and storage area. Placed appropriately to ensure privacy.

openings.details: Large entrance door complemented by a small reception lobby ensuring easy access.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an attached private balcony overlooking the garden area. Vastu oriented with south-east direction for positive energy.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary master suite featuring ample closet space and a small meditation room.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom with minimalist design for children or family members.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Dedicated gym space ensuring privacy. Includes essential gym equipment and a ventilation system.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: En-suite bathroom for the master bedroom with Vastu compliant placements of fixtures.

openings.details: Balconies in master bedrooms are aligned according to Vastu principles.
Used for additional storage or small outdoor seating area.
